snippet: The People’s Bank of China (PBOC) announced that effective March 17, the exchange rate will be allowed to rise or fall 2 percent from a daily midpoint rate set each morning.
lead_paragraph: The People’s Bank of China (PBOC) announced that effective March 17, the exchange rate will be allowed to rise or fall 2 percent from a daily midpoint rate set each morning.

headline.main: China Widens Yuan Trading Band to 2 Percent
